item.title: Jinj2 with Handlebars
item.description: Jinja2 and Handlebar use the same delimiters for expressions. In order to avoid parsing errors, you have to do as follow. {% gist icharlie/360dacf4b6b6bcff7d9e %} ps: jekyll uses the same…. Update: 2013-11-11 You can put the code into {{ “{% raw ” }}%} and {{ “{% endraw ” }}%} block; then jinja2 will escape this block.
